name: Dragoon X Omega
overview:
Dragoon X Omega is a hack of the NES game Dragon Warrior credited to "Sliver X". A very extensive hack, Dragoon X Omega features totally new graphics and music, as well as a totally redone setting (post-apocalyptic science fiction as opposed to fantasy) and storyline. A sequel, Dragoon X Omega II, was also created, this time hacking Final Fantasy for its engine.

A nation just over a rebellion by their own psychic soldiers is attacked by an alien being in a giant star ship. The last one of the rebels that has not been executed is given a choice: Save the land of Amnethen or die at the hands of her former master, Lord Vin.

An epic full-scale RPG Hack that is sure to blow you away!
